meanings.definition: In a manner characterized by abrupt stops and starts.
meanings.sent1: The boat moved choppily on the turbulent waves.
meanings.sent2: She danced choppily to the fast-paced music.
meanings.sent3: The robot vacuum cleaner moved choppily, bumping into walls.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine ran choppily, like a tired horse.
meanings.sent5: The scissors cut choppily through the thick paper.

meanings.definition: With a rough or uneven quality.
meanings.sent1: The choppily cut vegetables made the soup look homemade.
meanings.sent2: The road was choppily paved, causing a bumpy ride.
meanings.sent3: His choppily written essay was hard to read.
meanings.sent4: The choppily painted fence gave the garden a rustic charm.
meanings.sent5: The choppily sewn dress had a unique, handmade feel.
